imageCaption: Creative direction / brand identity / UI / UX
obstacle: the previous identity and digital landscape had become stale over the past decade-plus
outcome: a fresh, modern, and sophisticated brand experience that fits Kirkland & Ellis's reputation as a world leader in legal
title: Kirkland
objective: create a new aesthetic and experience that reflects this global firm's exceptional, high-end capabilities
description: the world's highest-grossing law firm at over $3B in annual revenue
